alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Paulding, southwestern Cherokee, northeastern Polk and southern Bartow Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Euharlee, or near Cartersville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Cartersville, Woodstock, Holly Springs, Euharlee, Emerson, Taylorsville, Cassville, Kellogg Creek, Red Top Mountain State Park, Little River Landing, George Washington Carver St Pk, Stilesboro, Sutallee, Hobgood Park and Bridgemill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
